results.title: Metformin use and the risk of total knee replacement among diabetic patients: a propensity-score-matched retrospective cohort study
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been shown to modulate meta-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, an important pathogenesis in @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis_Knee</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020370 @@@knee osteoarthritis@@@ (@DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@).

results.title: Pleiotropic Effects of Metformin in Osteoarthritis
results.text_hl: Considering the contemporary concept about the existence of metabolic type @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis_Knee</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020370 @@@knee OA@@@, in which the accompanying @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and systemic low-grade @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ are suggested to influence disease course, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could be considered as a useful and safe component of the personalized therapeutic approach in @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis_Knee</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020370 @@@knee OA@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with accompanying @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type II diabetes@@@ or @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@.
